Rolf Singer (rolf@collectivesource.com) asked the Mushroom Observer website to forward the following email to you:

Shall we discuss it in email?

--------------------------------------------------

It is entirely up to you whether you want to reply by emailing directly back to them.  Here are some handy links you may find useful:

Show this user: http://localhost:3000/observer/show_user/1
Stop receiving inquiries: http://localhost:3000/account/no_question_email/2
Change your account preferences: http://localhost:3000/account/prefs/2
Latest changes at Mushroom Observer: http://localhost:3000

If you feel the sender of this mail is abusing this service please forward this entire message to: webmaster@mushroomobserver.org
